title: Lycan
description: The Lycan’s arrival brings with it a set of unforeseen complications. It is against this backdrop that a more sinister plot to the failed coup attempt unravels, which also reveal the involvement of the Wolven’s most hated enemy. While the Wolven try to avert the new threat to their survival, a tentative romance blossoms amidst this turmoil to set the path for the gradual integration of the Oakridge and Canon Creek Wolf Packs.
author: Stein Willard
